summary: This mod is a replacer of Skyrim doomstones and their locations. ESO-inspired.
descriptionHtml:
While playing Elder Scrolls Online, I caught myself thinking about replacing Skyrim doomstones to new ESO-inspired version. I think it might refresh your view at old doomstones locations which looked almost simillar with the exception of couple locations which I didn't touch. Exceptions are Apprentice, Atronach, Lady and Lover stones.

This is my third mod for Skyrim. This mod is a replacer of Skyrim doomstones and their locations.

(btw, sorry if my English is bad, it's not my native language :D)
author: son6of6tredis
